reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on our way from Marlborough to Queenstown. The hotel is pretty basic, and even though it seemed like it was almost empty, we were given a pretty badly located room right next to the bar kitchens. The fixtures have seen better days, and there seemed to be several newer similar motels around which probably would offer better rooms for a similar price.
reviews.title: Not great

likes.disliked: — Room fixtures and fittings pretty dated

reviews.text: This place was reccommended to us by a friend who said it would be perfect for a girls weekend away - upon looking on the website it did in fact look exactly what we were after! 3 bedroom motel unit with its own garage and all the mod cons etc. There were actually a lot of issues with our stay - mainly the lack of interest/customer service skills of the staff (on more than one occasion it seemed to be the actual owners we were dealing with) there was no stereo or radio in the room dispite it being listed on website, there was hair all over the floor in the shower before we'd even used it! The garage was used as some sort of storage area for their junk and could barely fit the car in it as there was old fridges, washing machines and obsurd amounts of boxes of old tea pots and other crockery from floor to ceiling. There was no freezer in the room so we had no where to put our ice and other frozen goods which we had bought with us and the bar staff seemed hugely put out by us asking for a couple of bowls of ice from them when ours had all melted! And we had specifically asked for a late check out (which was agreed upon via email previously) but the male owner rang us at 9.55am to "remind" us we had to be out soon and when I explained that we had a late check out he was rather abrubt about it on the phone! All in all very unimpressed with the Benvenue they couldnt have made us feel less welcome which I find somewhat amusing as we seemed to be the only people staying in the complex that whole weekend.... Wonder Why!!
reviews.title: Quite Disappointing

likes.liked: — Main Room had its own ensuite and LCD tv

reviews.text: I would rate the hotel as no better and no worse than others at their price level; BUT
reviews.title: Check -in problems

likes.disliked: — Unwillingness to acknowledge booking mistake made by them.

reviews.text: They overbooked for one of the three days we were supposed to stay there - they had three group bookings and could not accommodate them all. We were sent up the road to another lesser motel. Another couple in our group were placed in a luxury suite that clearly was not what they had booked. I was shown a confirming e-mail from the hotel that clearly stated that we were booked for all three nights (it even quoted the room number) but they showed no willingness to accept that they had got it wrong (purposely or otherwise).
reviews.title: Every thing you need for a short stay.
